title: JEL Schema
description: The JEL is the Judge Entity Lookup for all unique judge entities

name.description: The name of the unique judge entity

Presentable_Name.description: A human readable entity name with first letters capitalized in each token

SJID.description: Unique SCALES Judge Identifier for the Paren Entity associated with this location

SCALES_Judge_Label.description: The predicted judge type based on the SCALES disambiguation routine and algorithmic labelling

Head_UCIDs.description: The total number of unique docket headers this entity existed on from our disambiguation sample

Tot_UCIDs.description: The total number of unique dockets this entity existed on from our disambiguation sample

Full_Name.description: If the judge entity is a known Article III judge from the FJC biological dictionary, then this is the concatenation of FJC name fields

NID.description: If the judge entity is a known Article III judge from the FJC biological dictionary, then this is the FJC NID field
